attributes.action: undertake a full review of the proposed smoking ban prior to its implemention
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The impending smoking ban is being implemented without any thought for the 
wider effects on employment,the right of people to enjoy their hard earned leisure time and no consultation with 
the 14 million people who still smoke.
I can accept the rights of non smokers
not to have to be exposed to passive smoke,but the blanket ban is not a balanced or thought through approach.
As a result of this ban, many thousands
of jobs (including my own) will be lost
and  many leisure establishments including pubs, clubs, casinos and bingo halls to name a few will be forced to close reducing our freedom to spend our leisure time as we wish.
I really cannot understand why smoking is so demonized, when drinking,with
use of the police resources and social problems it causes appears to be activly encouraged.By all means protect the non smokers in but in democratic country ,all sections have a vote and should have the right to be consulted before such draconian measures are introduced.
